content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Howdy!!

Engaging the user with an enthusiastic greeting sets a positive and inviting tone for the conversation, encouraging them to feel comfortable and open to sharing their thoughts, which is essential for fostering creativity in the droodle captioning process. This approach not only establishes rapport but also invites playfulness, making the exploration of ideas more enjoyable and productive.
